name: RadoffAssistant
0:
”Alexa, open Radoff assistant”
”choose device office”
”How is the air quality?”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: radoff assistant
Developer Terms of Use
des:
This skill provides information about your Radoff devices, air quality, atmospheric pressure, etc.

Instructions for connecting Alexa to a Radoff device.

Configuration

1. Purchase a Radoff Now or Radoff Sense device.
2. Configure your Radoff by following the directions on the manual in the package.
3. Activate the Radoff skill from the Alexa app.
4. Complete the account association procedure

Voice commands

To interact with Alexa and learn about the air quality parameters detected by your Radoff you can:

A. Ask about the air quality of a room where your device is detecting.
 Pronounce “Alexa, give me information about the kitchen ” (the name of your Radoff device)
B. Ask about the specific parameters being sensed
 Pronounce “Alexa, what is the radon value ?” (or any other measurement)
